snippet: Republicans oppose the Democrats’ approach to paying for the program, which reduces some student loan interest rates.
abstract: Senate Republicans block consideration of a Democratic bill to prevent the doubling of some student loan interest rates, leaving the legislation in limbo less than two months before rates on subsidized federal loans are set to rise; Republicans oppose the Democrats' approach to paying for the program.
lead_paragraph: Republicans oppose the Democrats’ approach to paying for the program, which reduces some student loan interest rates.

headline.seo: Senate Republicans Block Bill to Avert Rise in Student Loan Rate
headline.main: Republicans in Senate Block Bill on Student Loan Rates
headline.print_headline: Senate Republicans Block Bill to Avert Rise in Student Loan Rate
